about_the_game:
90s MY DEAR is a simulation management game where you will play as a little boy who travels back in time to the 90s. Come on, collect various props from the 90s to help classic NPC characters unlock unique weapons and rescue this twisted world

Key Features:

Collection of classic items from the 1990s


Various daily necessities from the 1990s can be collected and converted into currency for transactions or assembled into props for customs clearance

Classic farm simulation management


You will operate a state-owned farm unique to China in the 1990s

Interacting with classic characters from 1990s movies or TV shows


Classic characters that appeared on TV screens or movies in the 1990s will interact with you in the future, completing the tasks they give you and unlocking various props for clearance. This is a farm simulation management game, where players will play as a little boy who travels back to the 1990s. Characters from classic movies and TV dramas from the 1990s will interact with you, helping them unlock various clearance props and restore our familiar world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10及以上
  • Processor: intel core i3 及以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 没有特殊要求
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: intel core i3 及以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 没有特殊要求

short_description: This is a farm simulation management game, where players will play as a little boy who travels back to the 90s. Characters from classic movies and TV shows from the 90s will interact with you, helping them unlock various clearance items and restore our familiar world.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
